title: Social Energy

questions.text: When it comes to our social life, I'd love for us to...
choices: Have a close circle of couple friends we see regularly
Keep our social lives mostly separate and cherish our couple time
Be spontaneous - say yes to whatever comes up
Find a balance between group hangs and just-us time

questions.text: When I need some alone time to recharge, I hope my partner...
choices: Gives me space without taking it personally
Checks in on me after a while
Joins me in quiet parallel time - same room, doing our own things
Understands without me having to explain

questions.text: I feel most energized as a couple when we...
choices: Are out doing something social together
Have a cozy night in, just the two of us
Each do our own thing and reconnect after
Try something new together, just us

questions.text: For our ideal weekend together, I'd want...
choices: At least one social plan with friends or family
Mostly unstructured quality time, just us
A mix of adventure and downtime
To follow your lead and see what you're in the mood for

questions.text: Something I'm curious to learn about how we work together is...
choices: How we'll balance 'people time' vs 'us time'
Whether we recharge in similar or different ways
How we'll handle it when one of us is more social than the other
What traditions we'll create as a couple

description: Explore how you'll navigate the social world together.
